## Tuning parameters

```{r rpartScore-param-info, echo=FALSE}
defaults <- 
  tibble::tibble(parsnip = c("tree_depth", "min_n", "cost_complexity",
                             "split_func", "prune_func"),
                 default = c("30L", "2L", "0.01",
                             "'abs'", "'mc'"))

param <-
  decision_tree() |> 
  set_engine("rpartScore") |> 
  set_mode("classification") |> 
  make_parameter_list(defaults)
```

This model has `r nrow(param)` tuning parameters:

```{r, rpartScore-param-list, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
param$item
```

## Translation from parsnip to the original package

```{r, rpartScore-cls}
#| label: rpart-cls
decision_tree(tree_depth = integer(1), min_n = integer(1), cost_complexity = double(1), split_func = character(1), prune_func = character(1)) |> 
  set_engine("rpartScore") |> 
  set_mode("classification") |> 
  translate()
```
